paper_abstract: This paper is intended to propose a method to replace the original fuzzy linear system by two crisp linear systems. And then, the method is implemented by GMRES. If a fuzzy nonsingular linear system has a fuzzy solution, our method is able to obtain the solution. Otherwise, our method can only find a weak fuzzy solution. At last, some large scale numerical tests are presented.
paper_title: A GMRES Method for Solving Fuzzy Linear Equations
